Frequently Asked Questions

📅 How often do I get reports?

You’ll receive a new recon brief every night — no fluff, just real bid opportunities. Our system scans over 450+ portals daily, filters out noise, and sends you only the targets that match your trade.

🚫 Can I cancel or pause anytime?

Absolutely. There are no contracts or commitments. You can pause or cancel anytime. Our mission is to help you win work — not lock you into another subscription.

🔐 Do I need to log into bid portals?

No login or portal access needed. We do all the heavy lifting — scraping, scanning, verifying. You just open the PDF report we deliver to your inbox each evening.

🛠️ What trades do you support?

We support all major construction trades, including landscaping, electrical, HVAC, plumbing, concrete, low-voltage, and more. If it’s tied to a job site, we’ll track the bids for you.

📥 How do I get my first recon brief?

Just fill out the short form above with your trade and service area. We’ll run a custom sweep and deliver your first report — no charge, no credit card, no catch.

💰 What’s the cost to stay on?

Most contractors pay between $700–$1,500/month depending on trade, region, and depth of intel. You’ll know exactly what you’re getting before you commit.

🤖 Is this powered by AI or manual?

Right now, it’s human recon with AI-assisted filters. As we collect more data, we’re training proprietary agents to automate intel — but for now, every brief is verified by a real human.
